lead_paragraph: BERTCHER-- Robert W.,MD, passed away peacefully in his sleep on June 5, 2016. Dr. Bertcher was born on April 24, 1925. He attended the University of Pennsylvania as an undergraduate and received his medical degree from NYU Medical School. Dr. Bertcher was a Veteran of the Korean War, serving as a Captain in the United States Army. Dr. Bertcher practiced internal medicine in Lynnbrook, NY for more than 40 years before retiring to Gainesville, FL. He is survived by his wife of 47 years, Georgia; his brother Harvey, in Ann Arbor, MI and several nieces and nephews, including Quincy Thoeni, in Plant City, FL and Corey Bertcher, in Ypsilanti, MI. Memorial services have not yet been planned and will be held at the discretion of the family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERTCHER, ROBERT W.
